title: 65A.42 IMMUNITY FROM LIABILITY.
text: There is no civil or criminal liability on the part of, and no cause of action of any nature arises against insurers, the Minnesota FAIR plan, the governing board, or employees of the plan or the commissioner or the commissioner's authorized representatives, for any acts or omissions by them if the acts or omissions were in good faith and within the scope of their responsibilities under sections 65A.31 to 65A.42. The inspection reports and communications of the inspection vendors and the Minnesota FAIR plan are not public documents.
